questions.question: I would like ............................... drink.
questions.description: Another means an additional or extra.

questions.question: He has got two cars. One is in the garage. Where is ...............................?
questions.description: The other means a person or thing different from the one already mentioned.

questions.question: Some people support him while ............................. oppose him.
questions.description: Others is the plural form of other. It is used without a noun. Other means a person or thing different from the one already mentioned.

questions.question: One participant was from Spain and ................................ was from France.
questions.description: The other means a person or thing different from the one already mentioned.

questions.question: James and Samuel and three ................................. boys are there.
questions.description: Before a noun, we use other.

questions.question: There is a library on .............................. side of the road.
questions.description: The other means a person or thing different from the one already mentioned.

questions.question: She only reads biographies. She doesn't read any .............................. books.
questions.description: The other means a person or thing different from the one already mentioned.

questions.question: Some participants have arrived. Where are ..................................?
I will take ............................. two months to finish the project.
There were two boys in the room. One was John and ............................... was Sam.
questions.description: The other means a person or thing different from the one already mentioned.

questions.question: I think you should give him .............................. chance to prove his mettle.
Has he got any ............................ sources of income?
questions.description: The other means a person or thing different from the one already mentioned.
